messages.messageBody:
Hi! I'm new too. I'm hispanic, though I speak English far better than my own language, and I'm definately an otaku! I've officially fallen in love with the Shinsengumi so I want to learn about them! lol! It's nice to see that I'm not the only one! XD

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
